entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS MORNING, THEN MOSTLY SUNNY THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH THIS AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
